products.name: GoPro HERO Session Waterproof HD Sports & Helmet Camera
products.shortDescription: Whether you're recording extreme adventures or simply lifelogging, the HERO Session delivers GoPro performance in a convenient grab-and-go camera. Capture hi-def video and images in a waterproof design that eliminates the need for a separate housing. It has Wi-Fi and Bluetooth so you can control, view, and share your content from your smartphone.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 DC III Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Photography isn't hard, especially with the Canon EOS Rebel T6. It has a Feature Guide that gives short explanations of shooting modes, settings, and more, and a Creative mode that explains how to change exposure, tone, sharpness, and more. This 18MP camera has built-in Wi-Fi and NFC for remote control and easy sharing, and an 18-55mm DC III lens.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm DC Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Whether you're a budding photo enthusiast or first-time SLR user, the Canon EOS Rebel T5 with 18-55mm DC lens makes it easy to shoot high-resolution photos and videos in all sorts of situations. This rugged SLR takes the guesswork out of complicated shots, even at low light, and offers creative functions so you can play with unique perspectives.

products.name: GoPro HERO4 Silver
products.shortDescription: Document your experiences in a whole new way with the GoPro HERO4 Silver, the first ever GoPro camera with built-in touch display. Now you can view, swipe or tap for quick playback or settings adjustments on the fly. The HERO4 also delivers high-quality video, including 4K15 and 1080p60 resolution video, and 12MP photos at a staggering 30 fps.

products.name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS WiFi 20.0MP 42x Optical Zoom Digital Camera - Black
products.shortDescription: Preserve your favourite memories with the Canon PowerShot SX420 IS camera. It features 42x optical zoom with Intelligent IS for clear images whether you're shooting stills or video. It has a 20MP sensor and DIGIC 4+ image processor for hi-res images and 720p HD video. Built-in WiFi and NFC offer easy connectivity and sharing with your mobile device.

products.name: ACTIVEON LX 3.5MP Action Camera (LKA10W-B)
products.shortDescription: The 3.5MP CMOS sensor on the ACTIVEON LX action camera captures your greatest adventures and wildest moments in brilliant Full HD 1080p at 30fps. Lightweight and portable, it's easy to pack around and simple to use, featuring a 2-inch LCD display with live playback. It comes with a 60m rated waterproof housing.

products.name: GoPro HERO3 White Bundle
products.shortDescription: Capture all the action on your underwater adventures and mountain escapades with the GoPro HERO3 White Edition holiday bundle. Strap the HERO3 onto your helmet, handlebars, or gear to record footage of your extreme adventures in Full HD or take 5MP photos. With built-in WiFi, you can preview video on your smartphone or tablet through the GoPro app.

products.name: ACTIVEON CX HD Sports & Helmet Camera Bundle
products.shortDescription: Capture and record your finest moments and outdoor adventures with the ACTIVEON CX action camera. It shoots in Full 1080p HD video and features a 5MP CMOS image sensor, ensuring your once-in-a-lifetime experiences are recorded in crystal-clear detail. The waterproof housing means you can take it to the beach and go surfs up.

products.name: GoPro HERO
products.shortDescription: Don't let your incredible adventures go undocumented. The GoPro HERO Edition camera features a slim profile, is wearable and mountable, and comes with a rugged, waterproof housing. The HERO features 1080p30 and 720p60 high-res video, and 5MP photos up to 5 fps, so you can capture stunning and immersive footage to share with friends and family.

products.name: Canon Rebel T5i DSLR Camera with 18-135mm IS STM Lens Kit, Tripod, Bag & Memory Card
products.shortDescription: The Canon Rebel T5i is a powerful DSLR that lets you channel your creativity to capture special moments. This 18.0MP camera boasts a DIGIC 5 image processor so you get exceptional quality in every shot, while the Hybrid CMOS AutoFocus system assures perfect clarity, even in continuous shooting. This package includes a bag, tripod, and 8GB SD cards.

products.name: Insignia 5-Piece Accessory Kit for GoPro (NS-DGPK05-C)
products.shortDescription: Get the most from your GoPro with this collection of handy accessories from Insignia. The 5-piece kit is compatible with most GoPro cameras and includes a head and chest mount system, tripod adapter, and storage/carry pouch.

products.name: Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 STM Lens
products.shortDescription: The nifty-fifty just got a little niftier. Canon's EF 50mm f/1.8 STM lens is an excellent prime lens for portraits, action, and nighttime photography. The stepping motor offers near silent, continuous Movie Servo AF for movies, plus speedy, smooth AF for stills. It's the perfect lens for photographers and moviemakers looking to expand their creativity.

products.name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 360 HS WiFi 20.2MP 12x Optical Zoom Digital Camera - Black
products.shortDescription: Your everyday life is filled with magic moments. Capture them all with the Canon PowerShot ELPH 360 HS. It features a 20.2MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4+ image processor that captures still up to 7.2fps and Full HD video. It has 12x optical zoom that gets you closer to your subject and built-in WiFi and NFC ensures easy sharing with your mobile device.

products.name: Lexar 200GB 95MB/s microSDXC Memory Card
products.shortDescription: The Lexar 200GB microSDXC Class 10 memory cards let you quickly capture your adventures in Full HD, 3D, and 4K video. It delivers read transfer speeds of up to 633x (95MB/s). The card leverages UHS-I technology, allowing you to get the most out of your tablet, sports camcorder, or smartphone.

products.name: Canon 75-300 mm Zoom Lens
products.shortDescription: The optical system, construction, and exterior are the same as the EF 75-300 mm f/4-5.6 III USM's. The difference is that it uses a DC motor instead of a USM to drive the AF.

products.name: Canon EOS 80D DSLR Camera with 18-135mm IS USM Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Packed with features, the Canon EOS 80D will become your favourite creative outlet. From its HDR movie and time-lapse movie modes to its in-camera still and video creative filters you'll have the tools to unleash your artistic vision. It has a 24.2MP sensor, DIGIC 6 processor, and Wi-Fi. Start shooting right away with the included 18-135mm lens.

products.name: Silicon Power Elite 64GB 85MB/s microSDXC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card
products.shortDescription: This Silicon Power Elite UHS-1 Class 10 microSDXC series memory card is great for lengthy Full HD videos and burst shooting with your DSLR so you can capture all those unique moments in time. Its advanced UHS-1 technology allows for read speeds up to 85MB/s, while its 64GB capacity gives you plenty of room to load up on photos and videos.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS STM Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: The Canon Rebel T5i is a powerful DSLR that lets you channel your creativity to capture special moments. This 18.0MP camera boasts a DIGIC 5 image processor so that you get exceptional quality in every shot, while the Hybrid CMOS AutoFocus system assures perfect clarity, even in continuous shooting.

products.name: Lexar Media 32GB 95MB/s SDHC Memory Card
products.shortDescription: Professional photographers and videographers trust the performance of Lexar Professional memory cards. This 32GB SDHC card lets you capture high-quality images and stunning Full HD 1080p, 3D, and 4K UHD video with your DSLR, HD camcorder, or 3D camera. This high-speed, Class 10 card uses UHS-I technology for read transfer speeds up to 633x (95MB/s).

products.name: GoPro HERO3/4 Wi-Fi Remote & Wrist Housing Bundle (ARWHB-101) - Black
products.shortDescription: Capture incredible footage on the fly with the GoPro Wi-Fi remote and wrist housing bundle. Compatible with the GoPro HERO3 and HERO4, the Wi-Fi remote allows you to remotely control your action camera, while the wrist housing lets you wear your GoPro like a watch so you can enjoy hands-free convenience.

products.name: Samsung EVO+ 128GB 80MB/s microSDXC Memory Card
products.shortDescription: Get great versatility with the Samsung EVO+ 128GB microSD card. It's ideal for use with action cams and mobile devices. Read speed of 80MBps and write speed of 20MBps offer fast file transfers and quick loading for apps. It is water-, temperature-, X-ray-, and magnet-proof so your files and memories are more likely to survive if something happens to the card.

products.name: Platinum Series DSLR Camera Bag (PT-DSLB02-C) - Black
products.shortDescription: This Platinum Series camera case is perfect for on-the-go photographers. Made with a polyester exterior and velvet interior, it's designed to protect medium-sized DSLR cameras and includes enough room to fit an extra lens.

products.name: Fuji FinePix XP90 Waterproof/Shockproof/WiFi 16MP 5X Optical Zoom Digital Camera with Case - Blue
products.shortDescription: The Fuji FinePix XP90 is a must-have for your adventurous lifestyle. It captures high-quality stills and Full HD video, even underwater. This rugged camera is waterproof 15m, shockproof from 1.75m, freezeproof to -10°C, and dustproof. It has built-in WiFi for one-touch transfer to mobile devices and remote capture. It includes a protective case.

products.name: GoPro HERO4 Waterproof 4K Sports & Helmet Camera - Black Edition
products.shortDescription: It's back in black. The GoPro HERO4 Black Edition delivers professional-level images, capturing 12MP stills and recording stunning 4K video. Plus, Protune gives you manual exposure control over Colour, ISO Limit, Exposure, and more. Built-in WiFi and Bluetooth let you connect to your smart device through the GoPro App for easy viewing and sharing.

products.name: GOCase Starter Kit for GoPro HERO/HERO+ & HERO 3+/4 Cameras
products.shortDescription: The GOcase H4 starter kit includes everything you need for your GoPro HERO camera. It comes with 4 of GOcase's top-selling products, including an H4-COMPACT GoPro case, a PRO-SLEEVE silicon cover, a PRO-CLIP rotating multi-clip, and H4-SHIELD lens protectors for your GoPro HERO, HERO+, HERO3/3+ or HERO4 camera.

products.name: Insignia Tripod (NS-TRP58-C)
products.shortDescription: Get the perfect shot with this 58" tripod from Insignia. With a 3-way pan head, quick-flip leg locks, and rubber no-slip feet, the tripod is quick and easy to adjust, and offers ultimate stability when taking pictures wherever you are.

products.name: Lexar Media 64GB microSDXC Class 10 Memory Card
products.shortDescription: This Lexar microSDHC Class 10 memory card gives you the power to capture more of what matters without worrying about maxing out your mobile device's memory. Save and store more of your vacation high-quality photos, HD video clips, and movies with the 64GB storage capacity. Designed for use with microSDHC-compatible devices.

products.name: Canon EOS Rebel T6i DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS STM Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Let this Canon EOS Rebel T6i with EF-S 18-55mm IS STM lens kit take care of the hard work so you can focus on capturing life's precious moments. Its 24.2MP CMOS (APS-C) sensor and DIGIC 6 image processor provide crisp, natural shots, while EOS Full HD movie mode delivers vivid Full HD videos. Built-in WiFi and NFC let you easily share your photos.

products.name: Sony A6000 Mirrorless Camera with 16-50mm Lens Kit - Open Box
products.shortDescription: Capture life at its finest with the Sony a6000 compact system camera with 16-50mm zoom lens. It snaps stunning 24.3MP images with realistic details, and records Full HD video. Built-in WiFi lets you control the camera through your compatible smartphone or tablet, while DSLR functionality lets you shoot like a pro without all the bulk.

products.name: Sony a6300 Mirrorless Camera with 16-50mm OSS Lens Kit
products.shortDescription: Capture action like never before with the Sony a6300 mirrorless camera. With lightning-fast autofocus (0.05 seconds), 425 phase-detection wide area AF points, and high-density AF tracking, the a6300 captures fast action. In-camera 4K video recording with Super 35mm captures lifelike footage with brilliant colour and detail. It includes a 16-50mm lens.

products.name: PowerShot G9 X Wi-Fi 20.2MP 3x Optical Zoom Digital Camera - Black
products.shortDescription: Pop the Canon PowerShot G9 X digital camera in your pocket so you can snap beautiful shots on the go and never miss a moment. Featuring a 20.2MP high-sensitivity CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 image processor, this handy point-and-shoot delivers crystal-clear Full HD 1080p video and crisp, stunningly detailed photos in all lighting situations.

products.name: ACTIVEON CX Gold HD Sports & Helmet Camera Bundle
products.shortDescription: Epic moments are meant to be captured and shared, not experienced and forgotten. With the ACTIVEON CX Gold action camera you can show the world your greatest adventures, explorations, and triumphs in stunning Full 1080p HD video and 16MP images. The waterproof housing means surfs up, while built-in Wi-Fi makes sharing to social media easy breezy.
